Scope

This law stipulates the national education system;educational institutions, teachers, learners;State management of education;rights and responsibilities of agencies, organizations and individuals related to educational activities.

Education goals

Education goals to comprehensively develop Vietnamese people with morality, knowledge, culture, health, aesthetics and occupation;have citizen quality, capacity and consciousness;have patriotism, national spirit, loyalty to the ideal of national independence and socialism;promote the potential and creative ability of each individual;Improve people's intellectuality, develop human resources, foster talents, meet the requirements of the cause of building, defending the Fatherland and international integration.

Property, educational principle

1. Vietnamese education is a socialist education with people, ethnicity, science and modernity, taking Marxism -Leninism and Ho Chi Minh thought as the foundation.

2. Educational activities are carried out in accordance with the principle of learning in parallel with the practice and theory associated with reality, school education in combination with family education and social education.

Educational development

1. Education development is the leading national policy.

2. Education development must be associated with the needs of socio -economic development, scientific and technological advances, national defense and security consolidation;Perform standardization, modernization and socialization;ensure balance of industry structure, qualifications, human resources and regions;expand the scale on the basis of quality assurance and efficiency;Combining training and use.

3. Developing an open education system and building a learning society to create opportunities for people to access education, to study at all levels, all forms and lifelong learning.

Explain words

In this law, the words below are understood as follows:

1. Regular education is education according to the course in educational institutions to implement a certain educational program, established according to the goals of all levels of education, training level and granted diplomas of the system.National education system.

2. Continuing education is education to implement a certain educational program, flexibly organized in the form of program implementation, time, method, location, meeting the needs of lifelong learning.of learners.

3. Educational quality accreditation is an evaluation and recognition of educational institutions or training programs that meet the educational quality standards promulgated by competent agencies and organizations.

4. Processing year is the form of organizing the process of education and training according to the school year.

5. Credits are the unit used to measure the amount of knowledge, skills and academic results that have accumulated in a certain period of time.

6. Module is a learning unit that integrates the knowledge, skills and attitudes completely to help learners have the ability to fully perform one or some jobs of a profession.

7. Output standard is a requirement to meet the quality and capacity of learners after completing an educational program.

8. Universal education is the process of organizing educational activities so that all citizens of their age are studying and reaching a certain level of education as prescribed by law.

9. Compulsory education is an education that all citizens of the regulation age must study to achieve a minimum education level in accordance with the law and be guaranteed by the State.

10. The amount of high school cultural knowledge is the basic knowledge, skills, and core of the high school education program that learners must accumulate to be able to continue studying vocational education levelhigher.

11. Investors are organizations and individuals carrying out investment activities in the field of education with non -state budget capital including domestic investors and foreign investors.

12. Educational institutions are organizing educational activities in the national education system including schools and other educational institutions.

Requirements for content, educational methods

1. The content of education must ensure basic, comprehensive, practical, modern, systematic and regularly updated;attaching importance to educating ideology, moral qualities and citizens' consciousness;Inheriting and promoting good traditions, national cultural identity, absorbing the quintessence of human culture;Suitable for physical development, intelligence, age psychology and the ability of learners.

2. The educational method must be scientific, promoting the positive, self -consciousness, initiative and creative thinking of learners;Fostering learners self -study and cooperation, practical ability, passion for learning and the will to rise.

Education program

1. Educational education programs for educational goals;stipulating standards of knowledge, skills, requirements to achieve the quality and capacity of learners;scope and structure of educational content;Methods and forms of educational activities;How to evaluate educational results for subjects in each class, each level or subjects, modules, and disciplines for each level of training.

2. Education programs must ensure science and practice;Inheritance and interconnection between levels of education, training level;create conditions for the flow and transition between training levels, training sectors and educational forms in the national education system so that the locality and educational institutions can actively implement appropriate educational plans;Meet gender equality goals, international integration requirements.The educational program is a basis for ensuring comprehensive quality of education.

3. Standard knowledge, skills and requirements to meet the quality and competencies of learners specified in the educational program must be concretized into textbooks for general education;Curriculum and teaching materials for vocational education and higher education.Textbooks, curriculum and teaching materials must meet the requirements of educational methods.

4. The educational program is organized according to the school year for preschool education and general education;According to the year or by the mode of accumulation of modules or credits or a combination of credits and the year for vocational education and higher education.

The results of learning subjects or credits, modules that learners accumulate when attending an educational program are recognized to consider the conversion value for the subject or credit, module, respectivelyIn other educational programs when a person specializes in training, transferring the form of learning or learning to level, higher level of training.

5. Minister of Education and Training, Minister of Labor, War Invalids and Social Affairs, within the scope of their duties and powers, stipulating the implementation of the educational program and the recognition of valueConvert learning results in training levels of higher education and vocational education as prescribed in this Article.

Career oriented in education

1. Career orientation in education is a system of measures conducted inside and outside the educational institution to help students gain professional knowledge, the ability to choose a career on the basis of combining aspirations and forte ofIndividuals with the labor demand of society.

2. Streaming in education is a measure to organize educational activities on the basis of vocational training in education, creating favorable conditions for students to graduate from junior high school and high school to continue studying at the level of education., higher level or study vocational education or participate in labor in accordance with the capacity and specific conditions of individuals and social needs, contributing to regulating the industry's industry structure.suitable to the country's development requirements.

3. The Government details vocational guidance and streaming in education in each stage in accordance with the socio -economic development needs.

Confusion in education

1. Connecting in education is the use of existing academic results to continue at all levels, other qualifications of the same field, training or when moving to training, educational and submission.Other training is consistent with the corresponding content requirements, ensuring the connection between all levels of education, the level of training in general education, vocational education and higher education.

2. The linkage in education must meet the quality assurance conditions.The educational program is designed in the direction of inheritance, integrating knowledge and skills based on the output standards of each level of training level in the Vietnamese national level framework.Learners do not have to re -learn knowledge and skills accumulated in previous educational programs.

3. The Government details the connection between all levels and training levels in the national education system.

Language, writing used in educational institutions

1. Vietnamese is the official language used in educational institutions.Based on educational goals and specific requirements on educational content, the Government stipulates the teaching and learning in foreign languages ‚Äã‚Äãin the educational institution.

2. The State encourages and creates favorable conditions for ethnic minorities to learn the voice and writing of their people according to the Government's regulations;People with disabilities listen and speak in signs of symbolic, people with disabilities who look at Braille braille in accordance with the Law on People with Disabilities.

3. Foreign language stipulated in the educational program is a commonly used language in international transactions.The organization of foreign language teaching in educational institutions must ensure that learners learn continuously and effectively.

Diplomas and certificates

1. The diploma of the national education system is granted to learners after graduation or after completing the educational program, meeting the output standard of the corresponding level in accordance with this Law.

2. Diploma of the national education system including junior high school diploma, high school diploma, intermediate diploma, college diploma, bachelor's degree, master's degreeSi and literature equivalent.

3. Certificate of the national education system is granted to learners to confirm the learning results after being trained and fostered to improve the level of education, career or issue to the examiner to take the exam for the certificateaccording to the law.

4. Diplomas and certificates by educational institutions are of all types and forms of training in the national education system with the same legal value.

5. The Government promulgates a system of higher education diplomas and regulates equivalent qualifications of a number of specific intensive training disciplines.

Citizens' rights and obligations

1. Learning is the right and obligations of citizens.All citizens do not distinguish ethnic groups, religions, beliefs, gender, personal characteristics, family origin, social status, economic circumstances are equal in learning opportunities.

2. The State implements social justice in education, creating a safe educational environment, ensuring integration education, creating conditions for learners to promote their potentials and talents.

3. The state prioritizes, creating conditions for learners to be children in special circumstances in accordance with the Law on Children, learners who are disabled people in accordance with the Law on People with Disabilities, Poor Non -Localnear -poor households exercise their rights and obligations.

Universal education and compulsory education

1. Primary education is compulsory education.

The State carries out universal preschool education for children 05 years old and universal secondary education.

2. The State is responsible for conducting compulsory education in the country;decide the plan, ensure the conditions for implementing education universalization.

3. All citizens of the prescribed age are obliged to study to perform universal education and complete compulsory education.

4. Families and guardians are responsible for creating conditions for members of the family of the prescribed age to study to implement universal education and complete compulsory education.

Inclusive education

1. Integration education is a method of educational to meet the needs and different capabilities of learners;ensure equality, educational quality, in accordance with the needs, characteristics and capabilities of learners;respect the diversity and difference of learners and regardless of discrimination.

2. The State has a policy to support the implementation of integration education for learners who are children in special circumstances in accordance with the Children's Law, learners who are disabled in accordance with the Law on People with Disabilities andOther relevant laws.

Socialize education

1. Developing education, building a learning society is the cause of the State and of the entire people.

2. The State plays a leading role in developing education.Implement diversifying types of educational institutions and educational forms;encourage, mobilize and create conditions for organizations and individuals to participate in the development of education;Encourage the development of private and private education institutions to meet the social needs of high quality education.

3. Organizations, families and individuals are responsible for taking care of the cause of education, coordinating with educational institutions to implement educational goals and building a safe and healthy educational environment.

4. Organizations and individuals with achievements in education are commended and rewarded according to the provisions of law.

Invest in education

1. Investment in education is development investment.Investment in the field of education is an investment activity of conditional business and investment industry, and investment support and support in accordance with the law.

2. The State prioritizes investment and attracts other investment sources for education;Prioritize investment in universal education and education development in mountainous areas, islands, ethnic minority areas, areas with extremely difficult socio -economic conditions and industrial parks.

The State encourages and protects the legitimate rights and interests of domestic organizations and individuals and Vietnamese residing abroad, foreign organizations and individuals investing in education.

3. The state budget plays a leading role in the total investment resources for education.

The role and responsibility of educational managers

1. Educational managers play an important role in organizing, managing and operating educational activities.

2. Educational managers are responsible for learning, training, improving ethical qualities, professional qualifications, management capacity and implementation of standards and regulations in accordance with law.

3. The State has a plan to build and improve the quality of educational management staff.

Scientific and technological activities

1. Scientific and technological activities are a task of educational institutions.

2. Educational institutions self -deploying or coordinating with scientific and technological organizations, production, business establishments and services in training, scientific research and technology transfer, service for developmentSocioeconomic.

3. The State creates conditions for educational institutions to activities of scientific and technological activities, combining training with scientific research and production in order to improve the quality of education;Building educational institutions into a central, scientific and technological center of the country or the whole country.

Do not spread religion, conduct religious rituals in educational institutions of the national education system, state agencies, political organizations, socio -political organizations and people's armed forces.

Prohibit taking advantage of educational activities

1. Prohibit taking advantage of educational activities to misrepresent the guidelines, policies and laws of the State, against the State of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, divide the great unity bloc of the entire nation, incite violenceThe force, propaganda of the war of aggression, destroying the customs and traditions, spreading superstition, customs, enticing learners into social evils.

Position, role and goals of preschool education

1. Preschool education is the first level of education in the national education system, laying the foundation for the comprehensive development of Vietnamese people, carrying out the nurturing, caring and education of children from 03 months of ageto 06 years old.

2. Preschool education is to comprehensively develop children physically, emotionally, intellectually, aesthetically, forming the first element of personality, preparing children to enter the first grade.

Requirements for preschool education and methods

1. The contents of preschool education must ensure that it is suitable for the physiological development of children;harmonizing, caring, nurturing with children's education;comprehensive development of physical, emotional, social skills, intelligence and aesthetics;respect the difference;Suitable for age and connected with primary education.

2. Preschool education methods are prescribed as follows:

a) Educating kindergartens must create favorable conditions for children to actively work, play and create attachment between adults and children;stimulate the development of senses, emotions and psychological functions;

b) Kindergarten education must create conditions for children to have fun, experience, explore and explore the surrounding environment in many forms, meet the needs and excitement of children.

Preschool education program

1. Preschool education programs must ensure the following requirements:

a) Demonstrate preschool education goals;

b) Regulations on requirements to be achieved at each age, educational activities, methods and forms of educational activities, educational environment, assessing children's development;

c) Consistent throughout the country and are flexibly implemented, in accordance with specific conditions of the locality and preschool education institutions.

2. The National Council evaluates the preschool education program established by the Minister of Education and Training to evaluate the preschool education program.The Council includes teachers, educational managers, experienced scientists, educational reputation and representatives of relevant agencies and organizations.The Council must have at least one -third of the total number of members who are teaching in preschool education.Council and members of the Council are responsible for the content and quality of appraisal.

The Minister of Education and Training promulgates preschool education programs after being appraised by the National Council for evaluating the preschool education program;defining criteria and process of compiling and editing preschool education programs;Regulations on standards and selection of toys and learning materials are used in preschool institutions;defining tasks, powers, operating methods, standards, quantity and member structure of the National Council evaluating preschool education programs.

Directly control;Controlling the inspection, verification, records and results of the settlement of denunciations, reports on criminals and petitions to prosecute the investigating agency, the agency assigned to conduct a number of investigating activities.Investigation agencies and agencies assigned to conduct a number of investigating activities shall notify the full and timely verification results to the People's Procuracy.

4. When discovering the reception, settlement of denunciations, reporting on criminals and petitions to prosecute incomplete and violating the law, the People's Procuracy requires the investigating agency and the agency to be assigned.The case of conducting a number of investigating activities carried out the following activities:

a) Receive, inspect, verify and issue decisions on settlement of denunciations, reports on criminals and petitions to prosecute fully and in accordance with the law;

b) Checking the reception, settlement of denunciations, reporting on criminals, petitions to prosecute and notify the results to the People's Procuracy;

c) Provide documents on law violations in receiving, settling denunciations, reporting on crimes and petitions for prosecution;

d) Overcoming violations of law and strictly handling violators.

5. Settling disputes over the authority to settle denunciations, reports on criminals and petitions for prosecution.

6. To perform other duties and powers in the control of the reception, settlement of denunciations, reports on crimes and petitions to prosecute according to the provisions of the Criminal Procedure Code.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Tasks and powers of the People's Procuracy when practicing the right to prosecute during the criminal investigation period

1. To request the investigating agencies and agencies to assign a number of investigating activities to prosecute or change and supplement the decision to prosecute the case and prosecute the accused.

2. Cancellation of decisions to prosecute, decide to change or supplement the decision to prosecute the case, decide not to prosecute the case illegally;ratify, or cancel the decision to prosecute, decide to change or supplement the decision to prosecute the accused.

3. Prosecuting, changing and supplementing the decision to prosecute the case and prosecute the accused in cases prescribed by the Criminal Procedure Code.

4. Approving and not approving the arrest of people in cases of emergency, temporary detention extension, temporary detention and other measures to limit human rights and civil rights.

5. Decision on application, change and cancellation measures to arrest, temporarily detain, detain, preventive measures and other measures that limit human rights and civil rights according to the provisions of the Law.

6. Approving, not approving and canceling other procedural decisions of the investigating agency, the agency assigned to conduct a number of investigating activities.

7. Proposing the request for investigation and requesting the investigating agency and the agency to assign a number of investigating activities to conduct the investigation to clarify the criminals and the offenders;Request the investigating agency to want to want the accused.

8. Directly conduct a number of survey activities in case of checking and supplementing documents and evidence when considering ratification of orders and decisions of the investigating agency, the agency assigned to conduct one.The number of investigation activities or in the event of detecting signs of injustice, wrong, neglecting crimes and violations of the law that the People's Procuracy has requested but not overcome.

9. Prosecuting or asking the investigating agency to prosecute criminal cases when detecting the behavior of the competent person in resolving denunciations, reporting on criminals, petitions to prosecute and in prosecution and prosecution,Survey shows signs of crime.

10. Deciding on the extension of the investigation time limit, the time limit for detention, transferring cases, applying shortened procedures, applying compulsory measures for healing.

11. Perform other duties and powers in the practice of prosecution rights in accordance with the Criminal Procedure Code.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
The duties and powers of the People's Procuracy when practicing the right to prosecute during the prosecution

1. The decision to apply, change and cancel measures to arrest, detain and detain, other measures to limit human rights and civil rights according to the provisions of the Law;Request the investigating agency to want to want the accused.

2. To request agencies, organizations and individuals to provide documents related to the case in case of necessity.

3. Directly conducting a number of investigative activities to check and supplement documents and evidence to decide the prosecution or when the Court requests additional investigation without the need to return the file to the muscle.Investigation.

4. The decision to prosecute, change and supplement the decision to prosecute the case, prosecute the accused in case the discovery of the case also has an offense, other offenders have not been prosecuted, investigated and paid.Profile for investigating agencies for additional investigation.

5. Deciding on separation, importing cases, transferring cases to prosecute according to its competence, applying shortened procedures, applying compulsory measures for healing.

6. Decision on extension, no extension of prosecution time, time limit for application of preventive measures.

7. Decision to prosecute, not prosecuting the accused.

8. Decision to suspend, temporarily suspend the case and accused;decide to recover the case, the accused.

9. Perform other duties and powers to decide the prosecution in accordance with the Criminal Procedure Code.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Duties and powers of the People's Procuracy when controlling judicial activities in the prosecution phase

1. Control criminal proceedings of participants in the proceedings;request and propose competent agencies, organizations and individuals to strictly handle the participants of the legal proceedings.

2. Proposing relevant agencies and organizations to apply crime prevention measures and law violations.

3. To perform other duties and powers in the judicial activities in accordance with the Criminal Procedure Code.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Tasks and powers of the People's Procuracy when practicing the right to prosecute during the trial of the criminal case

1. Announcing indictments or decisions to prosecute according to the shortened procedures and other decisions on accusations against the defendant at the trial.

2. Considering, impeachment, debate and statement about the settlement of the case at the trial.

3. An protest of the Court's judgments and decisions in case of unjust discovery, wrong and neglecting criminals and offenders.

4. Perform other duties and powers in accusing the provisions of the Criminal Procedure Code.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Investigation competence of the Supreme People's Procuracy investigating agency, the Central Military Procuracy investigating agency

Investigation agency of the Supreme People's Procuracy, the Central Military Procuracy Investigation Agency investigated crimes of violating judicial activities, crimes of corruption, positions occurring in judicial activities according toThe provisions of the law that offenders are cadres and civil servants under investigating agencies, courts, People's Procuracies, judgment enforcement agencies and competent people in judicial activities.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Practice the right to prosecute and control the compliance with the laws of the Supreme People's Procuracy investigating agency, the Central Military Procuracy investigating agency

The Supreme People's Procuracy, the Central Military Procuracy practice the right to prosecute and control the compliance with the law in receiving and settling denunciations, reporting on criminals and petitions to prosecute;The prosecution and investigation of the Supreme People's Procuracy investigating agency, the Central Military Procuracy investigating agency in accordance with Articles 12, 13, 14 and 15 of this Law and the provisions ofCriminal Procedure Code.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Settle complaints and denunciations in custody and temporary detention activities

1. The People's Procuracy is responsible for settling complaints and denunciations in custody and temporary detention activities.

2. Agencies and persons competent in custody and temporary detention must transfer to the People's Procuracy to complain and denounce from the temporary detention and detention within 24 hours after receiving the complaint., denounce.

3. The Head of the People's Procuracy of districts, districts, towns, provincial cities and equivalent, Head of People's Procuracy of provinces and cities directly under the Central Government, Head of the Military Procuracy of the Regional Military Procuracy,The Head of the Military Region Military Procuracy and the equivalent settlement of complaints for illegal decisions and acts in detention and detention of competent agencies and people under their control responsibilities.

The head of the superior Procuracy has the authority to settle complaints for the settlement of complaints of the Head of the subordinate Procuracy;The decision to settle the complaints of the superior Procuracy is a legal decision.

4. The Head of the Procuracy has the authority to settle denunciations for violations of law in custody and temporary detention of competent persons under their control responsibilities.

In case of expiry of the provisions of the law that the denunciation is not resolved, the Director of the superior Procuracy has the authority to settle the denunciation;The conclusion of the denunciation content of the Head of the superior Procuracy is the final conclusion.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Responsibility to fulfill the requirements, recommendations, protests and decisions of the People's Procuracy in criminal judgment execution

1. For the requirements of issuing a criminal judgment execution decision in accordance with the law, the request for provision of records and documents is related to the execution of criminal judgments, agencies, organizations and individualsRequest to do it immediately.

2. For the request for self -examination of criminal judgment execution and notification of results to the People's Procuracy, the Court, the criminal judgment enforcement agency, the agency or organization assigned a number of exam tasksCriminal judgments must be implemented within 30 days from the date of receipt of the request.

3. For recommendations, protests, decisions and other requirements of the People's Procuracy in the execution of criminal judgments, the competent authorities, organizations and individuals must consider, resolve and respond toor enforced in accordance with the Law on Criminal Judgment Execution.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Tasks and powers of the People's Procuracy when controlling the settlement of administrative cases, civil cases, marriage and family, business, trade, labor and other things as prescribed by Francethe law

1. Control the return of lawsuits and requests.

2. Control the acceptance and settlement of cases and cases.

3. Collecting documents and evidence in case of law.

4. Participating in the trial, sessions and statements of the People's Procuracy's views on the settlement of cases and cases in accordance with the law.

5. Procurement of judgments and decisions of the Court.

6. Control proceeding activities of participants in the proceedings;Requesting and proposing competent agencies and organizations to strictly handle the participants of the legal proceedings.

7. Proposing, proposing judgments and decisions of the Court has violated the law;recommendations and request courts, agencies, organizations and individuals to carry out the proceedings.

8. Performing other duties and powers in the control of the settlement of administrative cases, civil cases, marriage and family, business, trade, labor and other things as prescribed by law.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Tasks and powers of the People's Procuracy when inspecting civil judgment execution, administrative judgment execution

1. Control the issuance, transfer, explanation and correction of judgments and decisions of the Court.

2. Directly supervise the judgment execution of civil judgment enforcement agencies of the same level and subordinates, executors, agencies, organizations and individuals involved.

3. Supervising records on judgment execution.

4. Attending the meeting and stating the views of the People's Procuracy on the consideration and reduction of judgment execution obligations for the State budget revenue.

5. Control activities of relevant agencies, organizations and individuals in the execution of the judgment.

6. Request Courts, Civil Judgment Execution agencies of the same level and subordinates, executors, agencies, organizations and individuals related to the execution of the following tasks:

a) Make judgment execution decisions in accordance with the law;

b) Implement judgments and decisions in accordance with law;

c) Self -check the judgment execution and notify the results to the People's Procuracy;

d) Provide documents, documents and evidence related to the execution of the sentence.

The requirements specified at Points a, b and d of this Clause must be implemented immediately;The requirements specified at Point c of this Clause must be implemented within 30 days from the date of receipt of the request.

7. Proposing the Court, the Civil Judgment Execution Agency of the same level and subordinates, executives, agencies, organizations and individuals to fulfill the responsibilities in the execution of the judgment.

8. An protest of the Court's decision, decisions and acts of the heads and executors of civil judgment enforcement agencies of the same level and subordinates according to the provisions of law;Request suspension of judgment execution, amendment or abolition of decisions that violate the law in the execution of judgments and terminate acts of violations of the law.

9. Performing other duties and powers in the inspection of civil judgment execution and administrative judgment execution in accordance with the law.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Tasks and powers of the People's Procuracy when controlling the settlement of complaints and denunciations in judicial activities

1. Directly control the settlement of complaints and denunciations in judicial activities at competent agencies in accordance with law.

2. To request competent agencies to issue decisions on complaint settlement and conclusion of the denunciation contents;check the settlement of complaints and denunciations about judicial activities of their level and subordinates, notify the results to the People's Procuracy;Provide relevant records and documents to the People's Procuracy.

3. Promulgating conclusions to control and exercise the rights of petitions and protests according to the provisions of law.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Responsibility to report the settlement of complaints and denunciations on judicial activities of the Supreme People's Procuracy

1. The Head of the Supreme People's Procuracy shall report to the National Assembly to settle complaints and denunciations in judicial activities.

2. Every year, every year, the Supreme People's Court, the Ministry of Public Security, the Ministry of Defense and the Ministry of Justice notify in writing to the Supreme People's Procuracy on the settlement of complaints and prosecutionFoxes in judicial activities.

The Supreme People's Procuracy chaired and coordinated with the Supreme People's Court, the Ministry of Public Security, the Ministry of Defense and the Ministry of Justice guiding the implementation of this Clause.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Tasks and powers of the People's Procuracy when practicing the right to prosecute in the judicial assistance activities on criminal

1. To decide the transfer of foreign criminal assistance requirements to the competent investigating agency of Vietnam to prosecute and investigate.

2. Requesting foreign competent agencies to summon witnesses and assessors;collecting and providing evidence and documents;Examining criminal liability for offenders.

3. Performing duties and powers as prescribed in Articles 14, 16 and 18 of this Law in case the competent authority of Vietnam investigates, prosecuted and tried criminal cases as required byforeign.

4. Performing other duties and powers when practicing the right to prosecute in criminal judicial assistance according to the provisions of the Criminal Procedure Code and the Law on Judicial Assistance.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
The duties and powers of the People's Procuracy when controlling the legal assistance activities

1. To control the compliance with the laws of agencies, people and participants in active judicial assistance activities on criminal, civil, extradition and transfer of people serving imprisonment penalties.

2. Attending the Court's meeting on the extradition and transfer of people who are serving imprisonment penalties and expressing their views of the People's Procuracy.

3. The protest of the Decision has violated the law of the Court on extradition and transfer of people serving imprisonment penalties.

4. Implementing the rights, recommendations and other duties and powers in the procuracy of mutual judicial assistance in accordance with the law.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Crime statistics

1. The People's Procuracy is responsible for presiding over criminal statistics, coordinating with relevant agencies in criminal statistics.

2. Within the scope of their functions and duties, the procedure -conducting agencies and relevant agencies are responsible for coordinating with the People's Procuracy in criminal statistics.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Scientific research

Within the scope of its functions and duties, the People's Procuracy is responsible for studying criminals, science and control, contributing to the implementation of functions, tasks and fighting against crime and violations of the law.the law.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Legal construction

The Supreme People's Procuracy has the right to propose and submit to the law and the Ordinance;assume the prime responsibility for, and coordinate with relevant agencies and organizations in formulating laws;Promulgating legal documents under the competence in accordance with the Law on promulgating legal documents.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Training and retraining work

1. The People's Procuracy performs the tasks of training and fostering professional skills to create human resources, improve the qualifications for procurators, investigators, inspectors, other civil servants and officials and officialsof the People's Procuracy in accordance with the law.

2. The training and retraining establishments of the People's Procuracy shall organize the types of training and retraining in accordance with the law.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
International cooperation

The People's Procuracy of International Cooperation in training, retraining, scientific research, negotiation, signing, joining judicial assistance agreements and other international agreements as prescribed by law.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Legal dissemination and education

Through the implementation of the function of practicing the right to prosecute and control judicial activities, the People's Procuracy is responsible for disseminating and educating the law, contributing to the prevention and control of crimes and law violations.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Organization of the People's Procuracy 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
People's Procuracy system

1. Supreme People's Procuracy.

2. High -level People's Procuracy.

3. The People's Procuracy of provinces and cities directly under the Central Government (hereinafter referred to as the provincial People's Procuracy).

4. People's Procuracy of districts, districts, towns, provincial cities and equivalent (hereinafter referred to as district -level People's Procuracy).

5. Military Procuracy at all levels.

relevant_article.law_id: Lu·∫≠t T·ªï ch·ª©c vi·ªán ki·ªÉm s√°t nh√¢n d√¢n 2014
relevant_article.article_text:
Duties and powers of the People's Procuracy at all levels

1. The Supreme People's Procuracy practices the right to prosecute and control judicial activities, contributing to ensuring the law is strictly and uniformly observed.

2. The high -level People's Procuracy practice the right to prosecute and control judicial activities for cases and cases under the jurisdiction of the high -level People's Court.

3. Provincial -level People's Procuracies, district -level People's Procuracies practice the right to prosecute and supervise judicial activities within their localities.
