The order and procedures for conducting a specialized inspection

1. The order and procedures for conducting a specialized inspection are prescribed as follows:

a) Preparing inspection, including: Promulgating inspection decisions;Notice of the announcement of inspection decisions, except for the case specified in Clause 2, Article 63 of this Law.

In case of ensuring the inspection is focused, key, avoiding overlapping and duplicating, before issuing the inspection decision, the head of the inspection agency may decide the collection of information as prescribed inArticle 58 of this Law;

b) Direct inspection, including: Announcing the inspection decision, except for the case specified in Clause 3, Article 64 of this Law;collect information and documents related to the inspection content;check and verify information and documents;sanction administrative violations during the inspection process (if any);ending the conduct of direct inspection;

c) At the end of the inspection, including: Report on inspection results;draft inspection conclusions;appraise the draft inspection conclusions, except for cases where it is not necessary to evaluate the provisions of Clause 1, Article 77 of this Law;Promulgating inspection conclusions;Publicly conclusions inspection.

2. In case other laws have provisions on the order and procedures for conducting a specialized inspection with the provisions of Clause 1 of this Article, the provisions of that Law shall comply with the provisions of that Law.

3. In case of meeting the specific management requirements of the industry and field, at the request of the Minister, the heads of the Government and the Government, the order and procedures for conducting a specialized inspection.The industry is different from the provisions of Clause 1 of this Article but must ensure the minimum procedures for issuing the inspection decision, announcing the inspection decision, conducting the examination, verification of information, documents and promulgationInspection conclusions, publicly inspected conclusions.

Responsibilities of the head of the state management agency, the inspection decision, the head of the inspection team

1. Heads of state management agencies shall have the following:

a) Request the inspection agency of the same level to conduct inspection in case of detecting signs of violations of the law or to meet the requirements of the settlement of complaints, denunciations, anti -corruption and negative anti -corruption.;

b) Ensuring the operation of the inspection team is conducted for the right purpose, requirements and principles of inspection activities;do not interfere with the law in inspection activities;

c) Promptly handle proposals on inspection and direction and organization of inspection conclusions in accordance with law.

2. The inspection decision makers are responsible for organizing and directing the inspection team, ensuring the principle of inspection activities, ensuring the inspection is implemented in accordance with the law, for the right purpose and requirements;promptly resolve the recommendations of the inspection team and complaints, denunciations, petitions and reflections related to the activities of the inspection team.

3. The head of the inspection team is the head of the inspection team, responsible for organizing and directing members of the inspection team to comply with the scope, contents and progress of inspection according to the inspection decision and the advance planinspection;implementing the information and reporting regime at the request of the inspection decision maker;Responsible to the inspection decision on the operation of the inspection team.

Ensure discipline and discipline in inspection activities

1. Inspection activities follow the head regime.Members of the inspection team must abide by the decision and direction of the inspection team leader.The head of the inspection team and other members of the inspection team must comply with the decision and direction of the inspection decision.

2. Heads of inspection teams and other members of the inspection team have the right to reserve comments on their inspection results.

Handling violations of the law of the inspection person

1. The inspection decision decision, the head of the inspection team, the inspector, the other members of the inspection team did not complete the inspection task or intentionally did not detect or detect violations without handling,No proposal for handling or other acts of violating the law on inspection, depending on the nature and seriousness of the violation, they will be handled by the law or being examined for penal liability, if causing damage, they must be compensated, they must be compensated.Often according to the law.

2. In case after the end of the inspection, the competent authority detects the case that violates the law occurring at the agency, organization or unit that has been inspected on the same content that the head of the Thanh ThanhInvestigate, other members of the faulty inspection team must be responsible;Depending on the nature and seriousness of the violation, it is disciplined or examined for penal liability in accordance with the law.

3. In case the inspection team has discovered and reported to the case showing signs of law violations but the inspection decision maker did not handle it, the head of the inspection team and other members of the inspection team was not responsible forresignation.In this case, the inspection decision makers shall be responsible according to the provisions of law.

In case a member of the inspection team has discovered and reported the case showing signs of violations of the law but the head of the inspection team did not handle it, the member was not responsible.In this case, the head of the inspection team must be responsible in accordance with the law.

Inspection records

1. The inspection decision maker shall direct and examine the preparation and handover of inspection records.

2. The opening of the inspection dossier starts from the date the competent person signs the inspection decision and ends the dossier on the day the competent person shall issue a document to organize the inspection conclusions.

3. At least 15 days from the end of the inspection dossier, the Head of the Inspection Delegation is responsible for completing the preparation and handing over the inspection dossier to the inspection agency.

Collect information to prepare inspection

1. Before promulgating the inspection decision, based on the functions, tasks, powers, the head of the inspection agency assigns the relevant information collection to clarify the need for the bar.Investigate and ensure the inspection is focused, key, avoid overlapping and duplicating.

2. In case of clarification or supplementation of information to issue inspection decisions, heads of inspection agencies require agencies, organizations and individuals to be expected to be the subject of inspection to provide information in writingRegarding the content of expected inspection or sending people to collect information directly with agencies, organizations and individuals is expected to be the subject of inspection.

3. The person who collects information is responsible for reporting in writing to the head of the inspection agency, which clearly states the contents to conduct the inspection.

Inspection team

1. The inspection team was established to perform the inspection task and dissolve itself after the Head of the Inspection Delegation handed over the inspection dossier to the inspection agency.

2. The inspection team has the head of the inspection team and other members.Other members of the inspection team include the inspector and the other participating in the inspection team but not the inspector.

In case of necessity, the inspection team has the Deputy Head of the Inspection Delegation to assist the Head of the Inspection Delegation to perform the assigned tasks, in charge of a number of activities of the inspection team when the inspection team is assigned by the head of the inspection team.

Head of the inspection team, Deputy Head of the Inspection Delegation (if any) must be the one who has been appointed to the inspector rank.

Inspectors and other members of the inspection team performed the task as assigned by the head of the inspection team.

3. In case of necessity, the head of the inspection agency shows the inspection staff of the subordinate inspection agency or the professional and professional persons at the agencies and other units to participate in the inspection team.The solicitation and standards, regimes and policies for the person who are displayed by the Government.

4. Head of inspection team, other members of the inspection team must be a person with good moral qualities and expertise, no conflict of interest when performing inspection tasks.

5. Inspection decision makers can suspend, change the head of the inspection team, other members of the inspection team when they do not meet the requirements, tasks of inspection or violations of law, conflictBenefits or for other objective reasons that cannot be performed.

6. The Government details this.

Develop an outline requesting the inspection subject to report

1. Based on the contents of the inspection, the plan to conduct the inspection, the head of the inspection team is responsible for developing the outline requesting the inspection subject to report.

2. At least 05 working days before the announcement of the inspection decision, the Head of the Inspection Delegation shall issue a written request to the inspection subject to prepare the report on the inspection contents according to the report request.The document requires the content, form of reporting and reporting term.

Notice of the announcement of inspection decisions

1. The head of the inspection team shall notify in writing to the inspection subjects on the announcement of the inspection decision;The notice must specify the location, time and composition.

2. For specialized inspection activities, in case of detecting violations, it is necessary to conduct an inspection immediately, it is not notified of the announcement of inspection decisions for the inspection subjects.

Announcing inspection decisions

1. Head of the inspection team is responsible for the prime responsibility to announce the inspection decision.In case of necessity, the inspection decision maker shall assume the prime responsibility for the announcement of the inspection decision.

2. Participants in the announcement of the inspection decision include: Inspection team, representatives of leaders of agencies, organizations or individuals who are inspection subjects.In case of necessity, the head of the inspection team invites representatives of the agency to conduct inspections, representatives of relevant agencies, organizations and individuals attended the announcement of the inspection decision.

The announcement of the inspection decision must be recorded.

3. For specialized inspection activities, in case of detection of violations, it is necessary to conduct an inspection immediately, the announcement of the inspection decision may be made after making a record of violations of the violation.subjects of inspection;In case the inspection object deliberately absent, the head of the inspection team shall make a record certified by the commune -level People's Committee and continue the inspection as planned.

Location, working time of the inspection team

1. The inspection team works at the headquarters, the workplace of the agency or organization is the subject of the inspection, the headquarters of the inspection agency or at the place of inspection and verification according to the plan.Tra.

2. The inspection team works with inspection subjects, agencies, organizations and individuals involved in office hours.In case of work outside office hours, the head of the inspection team decides on a specific time after talking with the inspection subject and is responsible for his decision.

3. The location and working time of the inspection team and the change of location and working time must be notified in advance to the inspection subjects and relevant agencies, organizations and individuals.

Collect information and documents related to the inspection content

1. In the process of inspection, the head of the inspection team and inspectors requested the inspection subjects to report according to the outline;Request inspection subjects, agencies, organizations and individuals involved in providing information and documents related to the inspection content.

2. For dossiers and documents that do not need to seize, the recipient of dossiers and documents shall return to the inspection subjects, agencies, organizations and individuals involved;Return time is at the end of the direct inspection.

3. The delivery and return of records and documents must be recorded.

4. The management, exploitation and use of information and inspection documents shall comply with the provisions of the law on inspection and other relevant laws.

Check, verify information, documents

1. Heads of inspection teams and other members of the inspection team are responsible for studying information and documents collected;Assess the observance of policies, laws, tasks and powers of the inspection subjects related to the assigned inspection content.

Head of the inspection team and inspectors have the right to ask the responsible person, the involved person to explain the unknown issues;In case of directly working with the inspection subjects and related people, the Inspector shall report to the Head of the Inspection Delegation for consideration and decision.

2. In case of examination and verification of information and documents, clarifying the issue related to the inspection content, the inspection team leader, the person who issued the inspection decision invites the inspection subjects, the mechanical representativeofficials, organizations and individuals involved in working or asking the inspection subjects to report.

3. In case of examination, verification of the incident or clarifying the issues related to the incident, the person who decides the inspection, the head of the inspection team or the inspection subject may invite more.Representatives of local governments or others testify.

Handling violations during the inspection process

1. Inspection people must apply measures according to their competence prescribed in this Law and other relevant laws to end violations, promptly protect the interests of the State and the State andlegitimate rights and interests of agencies, organizations and individuals;In case of violations of the inspection subjects and relevant agencies, organizations and individuals that are not under their handling competence, the Head of the Inspection Delegation proposed the inspection decision or the head of the state agency.authority to handle.

2. Heads of inspection teams and inspectors detect administrative violations shall be forced to terminate such violations, consider the application of preventive measures and ensure handling of administrative violations, sanctioningEven in accordance with the Law on Handling of Administrative Violations without having to wait for the inspection conclusions.

3. In case of detecting a criminal sign, the Head of the Inspection Delegation must report to the inspection decision to immediately transfer the case of the case and the relevant documents and the written petition to the Capital ProsecutionThe investigation is competent to consider and handle in accordance with the law and notify the People's Procuracy of the same level.

The inspection team continued to inspect the approved inspection plan;The inspection decision makers issued the inspection conclusions in accordance with the law.

The investigating agency is responsible for notifying the inspection agency for the results of the case settlement;In case of expiry of the consideration and settlement of petitions to prosecute in accordance with the Criminal Procedure Code, the inspection agency has proposed to prosecute not to receive a written notice or disagree with the settlement results.then talk to the investigating agency, the People's Procuracy of the same level to clarify the reason, if still disagrees, the proposal to the investigating agency, the superior People's Procuracy consider, resolve and the newspaperFox of superior inspection agency.

4. Inspection subjects, agencies, organizations and individuals performing acts are prohibited or violated the obligations of the inspection subject specified in this Law, depending on the nature and seriousnessdiscipline, sanctioning administrative violations or being examined for penal liability, if causing damage, compensation must be compensated according to the provisions of law.

Amend and supplement the content of the inspection plan

1. During the inspection process, the inspection decision maker may amend and supplement the contents of the inspection plan at the request of the inspection team head or at the request of the head of the state management agency.the same level.

2. Head of the inspection team shall notify the content of amendments and supplements to the inspection plan to members of the inspection team.

Pause the inspection

1. The inspection decision decision decision to suspend the inspection in the following case:

a) There is force majeure event that affects the progress of the inspection;

b) The subject of inspection proposes to suspend the inspection, which has a good reason and the inspection decision decision;In this case, the time limit for suspending the inspection shall not exceed 30 days.

2. When the inspection is suspended, the inspection decision maker shall consider the cancellation of the applied measure or apply the measures according to its authority but must ensure that it does not hinder the normal operation of the opposite.Inspector statue.

3. The inspection decision decision makers continue the inspection when the reason for the suspension of the inspection is no longer available or the deadline for suspending the prescribed at Point b, Clause 1 of this Article.

4. The decision to suspend the inspection, the decision to continue the inspection must be sent to the inspection subjects.

End of direct inspection

At the end of the direct inspection at the place where the inspection was inspected, the head of the inspection team was responsible for reporting in writing to the inspection decision and notifying in writing to the inspection subject;In case of necessity, organize the meeting with the inspection subject to notify the end of the direct inspection.

Consider reporting the inspection results

The inspection decision makers review and evaluate the contents in the inspection results report of the inspection team.

In case of necessity, the inspection decision maker requests the inspection team leader to clarify or supplement the content in the inspection results report.

Develop a draft inspection conclusion

1. Within 05 working days from the date of receiving the inspection results report, the person who issued the inspection decision assigned the Head of the Inspection Delegation to draft the inspection conclusions.The draft inspection conclusions include the contents specified in Clause 2, Article 78 of this Law.

2. In the process of drafting an inspection conclusion, the inspection decision maker has the right to request the head of the inspection team and other members of the inspection team to report, request the inspection subjects or the agency or the group.Relevant functions and individuals explain and clarify the expected issues of conclusions on the inspection content.

3. The explanation must be made in writing with information, documents and evidence to prove the explanation content.The head of the inspection team is responsible for researching and proposing to the inspection decision to handle the explanation of the inspection subject.

4. The draft inspection conclusions are sent to other members of the inspection team to participate in the comments before submitting the inspection decision.

Other members of the inspection team have the right to reserve comments on the contents of the draft inspection conclusions.The head of the inspection team has the right to reserve the content of the content in the inspection conclusions before the inspection decision.The reservation is expressed in writing attached to the draft inspection conclusions.

5. Development time for drafting inspection conclusions is calculated from the date the person who issues the inspection decision to assign the draft inspection conclusions and are prescribed as follows:

a) For the inspection conducted by the Government Inspectorate, the time for drafting the drafting conclusions of the inspection shall not exceed 30 days, complicated cases may last but not more than 45 days;

b) For the inspection by the Ministry Inspectorate, the General Department of the General Department, the Department, the provincial Inspectorate, the time to draft the inspection conclusions shall not exceed 20 days, the complicated case may last butNot more than 30 days;

c) For the inspection conducted by the Department Inspectorate, the district inspection, the time for drafting the inspection conclusions shall not exceed 15 days, the complicated case may last but not exceeding 20 days.

Consult the draft inspection conclusions

In the process of drafting an inspection conclusions, the inspection decision maker may decide whether to ask for opinions of relevant agencies, organizations and individuals on one or some contents of the draft conclusion.inspect.Agencies, organizations and individuals are proposed to have written response to the contents to be consulted within the time limit at the request of the inspection decision.

Evaluation of the draft inspection conclusions

1. The draft inspection conclusions of the Government Inspectorate, the draft of the administrative inspection conclusions of the Ministry Inspectorate and the provincial Inspectorate must be appraised before signing the issuance.The evaluation of the draft specialized inspection conclusions of the Ministry Inspectorate and the provincial Inspectorate, the draft inspection conclusions of other inspection agencies are implemented when necessary.

2. The inspection decision makers consider and decide the assignment of units and individuals to conduct the appraisal of the draft inspection conclusions (hereinafter collectively referred to as the person who conducts the evaluation) to ensure the purpose,Requirements and contents under the inspection decision and the approved inspection plan.The appraisal of the draft inspection conclusions must be written in writing, which clearly states the content and time limit for appraisal.

3. The appraisal person has the right to request the inspection team to provide necessary information and documents for appraisal;Develop a report on evaluation results and take responsibility to the inspection decision on the evaluation results.

4. The inspection decision makers shall direct the review, absorbing the appraisal and completing the draft inspection conclusions.

Request the subjects to provide information, documents and reports, explain

1. In the process of inspection, the inspection decision, the head of the inspection team, another member of the inspection team is the inspector who has the right to request the inspection subject to provide information, documents and report byText, explanation on issues related to the inspection content.

2. Inspectors are required to provide timely, complete, accurate information, documents and take responsibility before the law for the accuracy and honesty of information and documents provided..

3. The inspection person is responsible for preserving, exploiting and using information and documents for the right purposes.For the original document, the inspection person is responsible for returning the inspection subject after the end of the inspection.

Request relevant agencies, organizations and individuals to provide information and documents

1. In the process of inspection, the person who issued an inspection decision, the head of the inspection team, another member of the inspection team is the inspectorate with the right to request the relevant agencies, organizations and individuals to provide information, documents on inspection content.

2. Agencies, organizations and individuals are required to provide timely, complete and accurate information, documents and take responsibility before the law for the accuracy and honesty of information and talentswhether provided.

3. The inspection person is responsible for preserving, exploiting and using information and documents for the right purposes.For the original document, the inspection person is responsible for returning agencies, organizations and individuals provided after exploitation and use.

Document sealing

1. Head of the inspection team decided to seal part or all documents of the inspection subjects when there are grounds to think that the document is related to the violation of the law or need to ensure the status quo of the document.

The decision to seal the document must be written in writing, which clearly states the document that needs to be sealed, the duration of sealing and the obligations of the inspection subject.The sealing documents must be made into a signed list of the representative of the inspection team and the inspection subject.

2. The time limit for sealing the document must not be longer than the time for inspection directly at the inspection place.The exploitation and use of sealing documents must be approved by the head of the inspection team.

Inventory property

1. The inspection decision maker, the head of the inspection team decided to inventory assets of the inspection subjects related to the inspection content when detecting between books and documents and reality, difference, irrationalityreason or signs, commit acts of appropriating and appropriating property.

2. The decision to inventory assets must be written in writing, which clearly states the property, time and inventory location, the responsibilities of the inventor of the inventory and obligations of the object with the inventory property.The inventory of assets must be recorded, in case the inventory property needs to be held, the Head of the Inspection Delegation requests the inspection decision maker or the competent person to decide on the custody decision in accordance with Article 89 of the Law.This.

For expertise

1. When the need for professional -technical content is needed to be a basis for the conclusion, the Head of the Inspection Delegation proposed the person to issue the inspection decision decision to solicit the assessment.The solicitation of the assessment must be written in writing, which clearly states the requirements, content, implementation time, and the assessment organization.

2. Agencies and organizations that are tested for assessment must carry out the assessment and notice of the assessment results within the time limit at the request of the inspection agency and take responsibility before the law for the accuracy and objectivity., timely of the assessment results.

3. Funding for assessment solicitation is paid by the inspection agency.In case the inspection subjects have violations, the assessment funding is paid by the inspection subject, unless otherwise provided for by the Law.

4. The Government details this.

Suspend violations

1. In the process of inspection, when detecting violations causing serious damage to the interests of the State, the legitimate rights and interests of agencies, organizations and individuals, the person who makes an inspection decision, Head of the inspection team decided to suspend violations or propose the competent person to issue a decision to suspend the violation.

2. The decision to suspend the violation must be written in writing, which clearly states the reason, content, suspension time and the subjects responsible for implementation.

Temporarily detaining property, license, practice certificate

1. In the process of inspection, when detecting illegal use of assets, licenses, practicing certificates, it is necessary to immediately prevent or to verify the details of evidence for conclusions and processingThe Head of the Inspection Delegation asked the inspection decision makers or the competent person to decide on the temporary detention of property, licenses and practicing certificates.

2. The custody decision must be written in writing, which clearly states the property, license, practice certificate of custody, the time of custody, the responsibility of the person who issues the custody decision, the obligations of the subjectProperty, licenses, practicing certificates are temporarily seized.The custody must be recorded.

3. The preservation and maintenance of property, licenses and practicing certificates shall comply with the Government's regulations.

Request credit institution blockade accounts of the inspection subject

1. When there are grounds to think that the subject of the inspection disperses the property, does not make the decision to temporarily seize the property, the decision to recover the property of the competent person specified in Articles 89 and Article 91 of this Law,The inspection decision makers requested the credit institution where the inspection subject had an account blockade account to serve the inspection.

2. During the inspection process, when there are grounds to think that the subject of the inspection disperses the property, the head of the inspection team requests the credit institution where the inspection subject has an account blockade account to serve the bar work.Tra.

3. The request for blockade of accounts must be written in writing, which specifies the blockade purpose, the subject with the blockade account, the time, the time of blockade and the implementation of the credit institution.

4. Credit institutions where an account of the inspection subject shall promptly and fully implement and report in writing on the implementation of the account blockade request.

5. The Government details this.

The recovery of property is appropriated, occupied, used in illegal or lost caused by illegal acts

1. The inspection decision maker issued a decision to recover the property when the inspection subjects committed acts of appropriation, occupation, illegal use or loss of property of the State without having to wait for the conclusion of the bar.investigate, except for other laws.

2. The decision to recover assets must be written in writing, which clearly states that the property must be recovered, the responsibilities of the relevant agencies, organizations and individuals, the implementation time, the responsibility of the subject with talent.Products are recovered.Subjects whose property must be strictly complied with the recovery decision.

The decision makers are responsible for monitoring, checking and urging the implementation of that recovery decision.

3. The Government details this.

Obligations of the inspection subject

1. Comply with inspection decisions.

2. Provide timely, complete and accurate information and documents at the request of the inspection person and take responsibility before the law for the accuracy and truthfulness of the information and documents provided.

3. To fulfill the requirements, petitions, inspection conclusions and handling decisions on inspections and competent agencies and individuals.

Complaints and recommendations of relevant agencies, organizations and individuals

Relevant agencies, organizations and individuals have the right to complain about the administrative decisions, administrative acts of the inspection and decision on handling of inspections in accordance with the law on complaints when there is alignment.think that decisions or behaviors are illegal, infringing upon their legitimate rights and interests;Recommendations on the content of the inspection conclusion when it is that the content is not accurate.

Authority, order and procedures for settling complaints in inspection activities

1. Heads of inspection agencies settle complaints for their decisions, behaviors, heads of inspection teams and other members of the inspection team.

2. Heads of state management agencies settle complaints for their inspection decisions and agencies and individuals under their direct management.

3. The order and procedures for settling complaints in inspection activities shall comply with the law on complaints.

Denunciation, recommendation, reflection and settlement of denunciations, recommendations and reflections on inspection activities

1. The denunciation and settlement of denunciations on inspection activities shall comply with the law on denunciations.

2. Heads of state management agencies and heads of inspection agencies shall receive and resolve promptly and comply with the law on contents in the inspection conclusions;Notice in writing on the settlement results to the petitioner.

3. Heads of state management agencies, heads of inspection agencies, heads of inspection teams shall receive and handle petitions and reflect on inspection activities.

4. The Government details the competence, order and procedures for resolving proposals on the contents of inspection conclusions and petitions and reflections on inspection activities.

The responsibility of the head of the inspection team, other members of the inspection team in supervision activities

1. Provide timely, complete and accurate information and documents specified in Clause 3, Article 99 of this Law.

2. Explaining and clarifying issues related to the content of monitoring at the request of the supervisor.

3. Report the inspection decision when detecting violations of the law of the supervisor in the process of performing the supervision task.

Organize the supervision and reporting of monitoring results

1. The supervision is carried out on the basis of the inspection team's activities to monitor the inspection team approved by the inspection decision.

2. The supervisor conducts the examination and evaluation of the inspection team and other information and documents related to the content in the inspection team's activities to monitor the inspection team.

3. At least 15 days from the end of the direct inspection, the supervisor must send the monitoring results report to the inspection decision maker;In case of irregular supervision at the request of the inspection decision maker, the time limit for sending the report is decided by the inspection decision.

4. Supervisory results are one of the bases for inspection decisions to consider and issue inspection conclusions.

The responsibility of the head of the inspection agency in issuing the inspection conclusions

1. The heads of the inspection agency shall issue a written request to the head of the management agency of the same level to direct the implementation of the contents of the inspection conclusions.

The petition must be sent simultaneously with the inspection conclusions, in which the proposal of the way and measures to organize the implementation of the recommendations in the inspection conclusions under the handling competence of the head of the management agency.the same level.

2. The heads of the inspection agency must report the results of the inspection conclusions to the head of the state management agency of the same level.

Responsibility of the head of the state management agency

The Prime Minister, the Minister, the President of the provincial People's Committee, the Chairman of the district -level People's Committee are responsible for directing the implementation of the inspection conclusions of the Government Inspectorate, the Ministry Inspectorate, Thanh ThanhInvestigation, district inspection.

General Director, Director, Director of the Department are responsible for directing the implementation of the inspection conclusions of the General Department Inspectorate, Department and Department Inspectorate.

2. Within 15 days from the date of receiving the inspection conclusions, the heads of state management agencies of the same level must issue a document organizing the implementation of inspection conclusions of the inspection agency.Regarding the conclusion of the Government Inspectorate, the Prime Minister issued a document to organize the implementation within 30 days from the date of receiving the inspection conclusions.The organization document has the following contents:

a) Handling or requiring and proposing competent state agencies to handle economic violations;

b) Handling or requiring and proposing competent state agencies to handle officials, public servants and public employees who commit violations of law;

c) Applying or requiring and proposing competent state agencies to apply measures to overcome and perfect mechanisms, policies and laws.

3. When directing the implementation of the inspection conclusions, the Prime Minister, the Minister, the General Director, the Director, the President of the provincial People's Committee, the Director of the Department, the Chairman of the district -level People's Committee haveThe right to request the inspection subject to submit the plan to overcome economic violations, assign the person to issue the inspection conclusions and the heads of relevant agencies and units for consideration and submissionPham ensures a thorough recovery of money and property of the state, creating conditions for the inspection subjects to continue maintaining and developing production and business.

4. The Prime Minister, Minister, General Director, Director, Chairman of the provincial People's Committee, Director of the Department, Chairman of the district People's Committee assigns agencies and units in charge of organization, officials in charge and coordinating with competent agencies to manage cadres, civil servants and public employees to handle cadres, civil servants and public employees who violate the law stated in the inspection conclusions;assigned the Government Inspectorate, Ministry Inspectorate, Provincial Inspectorate, District Inspectorate to monitor and urge the implementation.

In case the heads of competent agencies manage cadres, civil servants and public employees who do not handle cadres, civil servants and public employees who commit violations of law or handle are not in accordance with the nature and level of action.For the violations, the Prime Minister, the Minister, the Chairman of the provincial People's Committee, and the President of the district -level People's Committee shall consider and handle responsibilities for the heads of competent agencies to manage cadres and cadres andPublic servants.

Handling violations in implementing inspection conclusions

1. Persons responsible for monitoring, urging and examining the implementation of inspection conclusions without organizing the implementation or inadequate implementation shall be considered for handling responsibilities in accordance with the law.

2. Subjects of inspection, agencies, organizations and individuals shall have to implement the inspection conclusions and decisions on handling of inspections that are not implemented or inadequate, not timely, depending on the personality.substances and severity of violations that are disciplined, sanctioned administrative violations or being examined for penal liability, if causing damage, compensation must be compensated according to the provisions of law.

3. The Government details the handling of violations in the implementation of inspection conclusions.

Responsibility to coordinate in inspection, state audit, investigation

The agency performs the inspection function, the state audit agency and the investigating agency are responsible for coordinating to improve the effectiveness of the State inspection and audit activities, investigating and contributing to crime prevention and controland other law violations in state management.

The coordination responsibility of the Government Inspector General and the State Auditor General

1. The Government Inspector General is responsible for coordinating with the State Auditor General in accordance with the State Audit Law and this Law to ensure the effectiveness and effectiveness of the inspection and state audit activities..

2. The coordination is carried out in the process of formulating and implementing inspection and auditing plans;overlapping and duplicating between inspection and inspection activities and state audit activities;Provide and exchange information about inspection and audit;using inspection and audit results;Training and fostering professional inspection and auditing.

3. Every year, the Government Inspectorate and the State Audit evaluate and summarize the overlapping and duplication of the inspection activities and the State Audit activities to overcome when developing plans and in realityCurrently, the State's inspection and audit activities are for the following year.

The responsibility of the head of the agency performing the inspection function and the Chief Auditor of the regional and specialized state audit

Heads of the agency performing the function of inspection and the Chief Auditor of the regional state audit, the specialized branch are responsible for coordinating in activities, exchanging regularly to avoid overlapping and duplicating when conducting inspections and inspectionsmaths.

In case of discovery, the contents and scope of the inspection are overlapping, duplicating with other inspection agencies or state audit agencies, heads of the inspection function must immediately report to the head.management officials of the same level, superior inspection agencies and notify the State Audit, agencies, organizations and relevant units to have appropriate solutions to avoid overlapping, duplicating and ensuring calculationInheriting in activities between agencies, organizations and units.

Consult, use results in the State's inspection and audit activities

1. In the process of conducting inspection activities, state audit or before issuing inspection conclusions, audit reports, agencies performing the function of inspection and state audit can consult for noteeach other's opinions on the necessary contents to ensure the accurate, objective and complete inspection statements.

2. The inspection function has the right to use information, data and conclusions in the audit report of the State Audit to serve the inspection conclusions.The state audit agency is responsible for providing audit results, conclusions and audit petitions to the agency that performs the inspection function and is responsible for the accuracy of the information and documents provided.

Responsibility of the investigating agency

The investigating agency is responsible for receiving a written petition and case records showing signs of criminals and relevant documents transferred by the agency that performs the inspection function for handling in accordance with the French regulations.Law on criminal proceedings.

Operating funds of inspection agencies;regimes and policies for inspectors

1. The operating fund of the inspection agency is guaranteed by the state budget.

2. The management, grant and use of the budget of the inspection agency shall comply with the provisions of the law on the state budget.

3. The inspection agencies are deducted in part from the recovery amounts detected through the inspection after submission to the state budget in accordance with the regulations of the National Assembly Standing Committee to support the improvement of the capacity of the operation of the bar operating.investigate and strengthen facilities and reward, encourage organizations and individuals to achieve achievements in the inspection work.

4. The regimes, policies, allowances and specific regimes for the inspectors are prescribed by the Government.

Investment in modernization of inspection activities

1. The State has policies on investment and development of science and technology and other means to ensure the organization and operation of the agency performing the inspection function;Building databases for inspection;Application of information technology and digital technology in inspection activities;Develop inspection standards to ensure quality inspection activities, efficiency, feasibility, lawfulness, publicity and transparency.

2. The Minister and Chairman of the provincial People's Committee are responsible for ensuring the conditions to enhance the inspection activities and promote the inspection activities in a professional, regular and step -by -step way, contributing toimprove the effectiveness and efficiency of state management.

Organize and inspect activities in the People's Army, People's Police, the State Bank of Vietnam, the Government Cipher Agency

1. Organizing and inspecting activities in the People's Army and People's Police prescribed by the Government.

2. Organizing and inspecting activities in the State Bank of Vietnam shall comply with this Law and the Bank's law.

3. Organization and inspection activities in the Government Cipher Agency shall comply with the provisions of this Law, the law on cipher and other provisions of relevant laws.

Internal inspection and organization

1. The inspection agency of the Supreme People's Court, the Supreme People's Procuracy, the State Audit were established in accordance with the law, assisting the Chief Justice of the Supreme People's Court, the Director of the InstituteThe Supreme People's Survival, the State Auditor General perform the inspection tasks in accordance with the law.

2. Based on the provisions of this Law and other provisions of the relevant law, within the scope of their duties and powers, other agencies of the State, public non -business units, establishing a bar organization.internal investigation or arrangement of officials in charge of internal inspection in accordance with the Government's regulations to help heads of agencies and units carry out inspection work within their management scope.Heads of agencies and units are responsible for organizing and directing internal inspection activities in their agencies and units.

Amend and supplement a number of articles of the laws related to inspection

1. Amending and supplementing a number of clauses of Article 46 of the Law on Handling of Administrative violations No. 15/2012/QH13 has been amended and supplemented a number of articles under the Law No. 54/2014/QH13, Law No. 18/2017/QH14 and Law No. 67/2020/QH14 as follows:

a) Additional phrase "Chief Inspector of the General Department, other departments of the Ministry and the equivalent;"After the phrase "Chief Inspector of the State Securities Commission;"At the opening paragraph of Clause 2;

b) Additional phrase "Chief Inspector of the Government Agency, Chief Inspector of the province," in front of the phrase "Director of Statistical Department," at the opening paragraph of Clause 3.

2. Amending and supplementing Point a, Clause 2, Article 160 of the Law on Environmental Protection No. 72/2020/QH14 as follows:

"A) Inspection as planned;".

Effective

1. This law takes effect from July 1, 2023.

2. The Law on Inspection No. 56/2010/QH12 expires from the effective date of this Law.

Transition regulations

Inspections that have an inspection decision shall be issued before the effective date of this Law, continue to comply with the Law on Inspection No. 56/2010/QH12.

This law was approved by the National Assembly of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, the 4th session on November 14, 2022.



National Assembly Chairman Vuong Dinh Hue

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Scope

This Law stipulates the prevention, prevention, protection, support and handling of violations in the prevention and control of domestic violence;conditions to ensure domestic violence prevention and control;State management and responsibilities of agencies, organizations, families and individuals in the prevention and control of domestic violence.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Explain words

In this law, the words below are understood as follows:

1. Domestic violence is an intentional act of family members causing harm or being able to cause physical, mental, sexual and economic harm to other family members.

2. Prohibiting contacts is a measure to prohibit domestic violence acts near people with domestic violence or use of vehicles and tools to commit domestic violence acts.

3. The temporary place of shelter is a place to ensure safety for people with domestic violence.

4. Education, support for conversion of domestic violence is the process of providing knowledge, behavior skills, controlling negative emotions, controlling behavior, resolving conflicts to help people with violent actsFamily force ending domestic violence.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Principle of prevention and control of domestic violence

1. Prevention is the main, taking people with domestic violence is the center.

2. Respect and protect the legitimate rights and interests of the relevant people;ensure the best benefits of children;Priority to protect the legitimate rights and interests of domestic violence people who are pregnant women, women who are raising children under 36 months of age, elderly, disabled people, people who are unable to take care of themselves;Implement gender equality.

3. Focusing on propaganda, education, consultancy and conciliation in domestic violence prevention and control.

4. Acts of violating the law on prevention and control of domestic violence must be promptly detected, prevented and strictly handled in accordance with the law.In case a person with domestic violence is children, in the process of handling, there must be the participation of representatives of the state management agency on children or the assigned person to protect children.

5. Improving responsibilities of agencies, organizations and heads;focus on coordinating interdisciplinary in the prevention and control of domestic violence.

6. Promoting the role and responsibility of individuals, families and communities.

7. Performing the responsibility to set an example in the prevention and control of domestic violence against cadres, civil servants, officials and people of the people's armed forces.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Acts are strictly prohibited in domestic violence prevention and control

1. Domestic violence acts specified in Article 3 of this Law.

2. Inciting, inciting, enticing, seducing, helping and forcing others to commit domestic violence.

3. Using and spreading information, documents, images and sounds to incite domestic violence.

4. Revenge and threaten revenge on people who help domestic violence, who discover, report, denounce and prevent domestic violence.

5. Hearing the detection, reporting, denunciation, preventing and handling domestic violence.

6. Taking advantage of domestic violence prevention and control activities to commit illegal acts.

7. Tolerance, covering, not handling and handling improperly the provisions of law for domestic violence.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
State policies on domestic violence prevention and control

1. The State arranges budget to effectively implement domestic violence prevention and control;Priority is given to ethnic minority and mountainous areas and areas with extremely difficult socio -economic conditions.

2. To encourage agencies, organizations and individuals to support, sponsor, donate, contribute, support, support, invest in funding, human resources, facilities and necessities for the office work, anti -domestic violence;International cooperation on domestic violence prevention and control;developing happy family construction consultancy models, preventing domestic violence and supporting domestic violence;Develop a network of population collaborators participating in family work, prevention and control of domestic violence in the community.

3. Encouraging literary and artistic writing on domestic violence prevention and control;Application of science and information technology in domestic violence prevention and control.

4. Praise and reward agencies, organizations and individuals with achievements in domestic violence prevention and control;There is a support regime to compensate for health damage, life and property damage to individuals participating in domestic violence prevention and control.

5. Supporting the fostering of improving capacity for people working in the prevention and control of domestic violence.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Month of National Action Prevention and Control

1. The month of National Action Prevention and Control of domestic violence was held in June every year to promote domestic violence prevention and control activities and honor family values.

2. The Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism shall assume the prime responsibility for, and coordinate with relevant agencies and organizations to direct, guide and organize the implementation of the National Action Month of Domestic Violence Prevention and Control.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Rights and responsibilities of individuals in prevention and control of domestic violence

1. To be rewarded for achievements in prevention and control of domestic violence in accordance with the law on emulation and commendation;To be protected and kept confidential about personal information when reporting and denouncing domestic violence;supported by the State to compensate for health damage, life and property damage when participating in domestic violence prevention and control according to the Government's regulations.

2. Individuals when detecting the following responsible domestic violence acts:

a) To report and denounce immediately to competent agencies, organizations and individuals prescribed in Clause 1, Article 19 of this Law;

b) Participate in protecting and supporting domestic violence and domestic violence prevention and control activities in the community.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Information, communication, education

1. Policies and laws on domestic violence prevention and control.

2. Human rights, civil rights, gender equality in the family.

3. Good traditions of people and Vietnamese families;Good examples, good deeds in building happy families and prevention of domestic violence.

4. Knowledge of marriage and family;behavioral skills in the family;Skills to protect and support people with domestic violence;prevention, prevention and handling of domestic violence.

5. Domestic and international domestic and international violence prevention and control experience.

6. Other contents related to domestic violence prevention and control.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
The subject conducts mediation

1. Family members and lineages are responsible for reconciliation of conflicts and disputes in order to prevent domestic violence from arising or recurring.

In case of necessity, it is possible to invite religious dignitaries, village elders, village chiefs, prestigious people in the community, relatives, people in the agency, organization of the subject with conflicts, disputes and peopleTrained or experienced in social work, psychology, experienced people in the prevention and control of domestic violence to participate in reconciliation.

2. Agencies and organizations are responsible for organizing conflicts and disputes between people of that agency or organization and their family members when they have the request of family members;In case of necessity, coordinate with local agencies and organizations to reconcile.

3. The grassroots conciliation team is responsible for reconciliation, disputes and violations of the law on prevention and control of domestic violence according to the provisions of the Law on Mediation at the grassroots level.

4. Commune -level People's Committees shall assume the prime responsibility and coordinate with the Vietnam Fatherland Front Committee of the same level and other organizations and individuals guiding and fostering knowledge and skills on domestic violence prevention and controlFor the mediator of the grassroots mediation team.
